sentences.sContent: This novel is a legend of a struggler and explorer.
sentences.sContent_eng: This novel is a legend of a struggler and explorer.
sentences.sCn: 这小说是一个奋斗者和探索者的传奇。

sentences.sContent: I suppose every struggler in loneliness can see to it as a doctrine, as well as me.
sentences.sContent_eng: I suppose every struggler in loneliness can see to it as a doctrine, as well as me.
sentences.sCn: 我觉得孤独的奋斗者都可以把它当成箴言，就像我这样的人。
